objects.text:
• Reduces Indoor Temperature
• Eco-Friendly Formulation
• Energy-Efficient Solution
• Weather-Resistant Protection

Professional-Grade Quality for
Residential & Commercial Use

objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 100'><circle cx='100' cy='50' r='45' fill='#007F75' opacity='0.1' stroke='#007F75' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M80,35 Q100,20 120,35 Q130,60 100,75 Q70,60 80,35' fill='#007F75' opacity='0.8'/><path d='M95,60 L105,60 L105,70 L95,70 Z' fill='#007F75'/><text x='100' y='95' text-anchor='middle' font-family='Arial' font-size='12' fill='#007F75'>ECO FRIENDLY</text></svg>

product_details.name: Panache Cool Top Eco - Premium Heat Reflective Cooling Paint (5KG)
product_details.description:
• High-performance thermal reflective coating for superior temperature reduction
• Eco-friendly formulation for sustainable building solutions
• 5KG bucket size - ideal for medium to large surface coverage
• Easy application on various roof surfaces
• Weather-resistant and long-lasting protection
• Energy-efficient solution for reducing indoor temperatures
• Professional-grade quality for both residential and commercial use
• Helps reduce cooling costs and energy consumption
• Water-based formula for safe and clean application
• Suitable for multiple surface types including concrete, metal, and tiles

banner_details:
This banner features a clean and modern design promoting an eco-friendly heat reflective paint. It is sectioned into a four-quadrant grid layout with contrasting aqua and light teal tones. The top-left section contains a bold, uppercase headline (`heading`), a technical subheading (`subheading`), and the brand attribution (`tagline`). The bottom-left showcases four key product features (`description`) in bullet points, a highlighted price (`price`), and a prominent call-to-action button (`cta`). The right side presents a product image (`product_image`) with specifications like size (`product_size`) and usage suitability (`product_description`). A circular badge (`decorative_badge`) emphasizes eco-friendliness using thematic iconography.

**Color Palette:**
- Aqua Green: #00A79D  
- Deep Teal: #007F75  
- Ice Blue: #E6F4F4  
- Light Grey: #F5F5F5  
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image uses a clean and modern color palette designed to convey a sense of coolness, eco-friendliness, and professionalism. Dominant colors include teal green (#008C8C), which symbolizes freshness and environmental sustainability, and white (#FFFFFF), used in the background and text to promote cleanliness and simplicity. Dark navy blue (#002F6C) is used in the brand name "Panache" to add a touch of trust and reliability. Lime green (#A3D900) in the leaf icon adds an eco-friendly accent. The color blending is smooth yet contrasting — teal and white dominate visual focus, while blue and green are strategically used for branding emphasis.
